text: Anna is excited to open her gifts. (variation 1)
Tom feels sad because he lost his toy. (variation 1)
The children were thrilled to play in the park all afternoon. (variation 1)
Susan was disappointed when her favorite book was out of stock. (variation 1)
David’s face lit up with joy as he received the promotion at work. (variation 1)
Rachel was nervous about giving her first presentation at the conference. (variation 1)
John smiled, but there was a hint of sadness in his eyes as he said goodbye. (variation 1)
The team was exhausted but relieved after winning the final game. (variation 1)
Emily’s laughter masked her deep sense of loneliness at the party. (variation 1)
The artist looked at his masterpiece with pride, though he felt something was still missing. (variation 1)
